name: Kissing Simulator
description:
Kissing Simulator
Gentlemen, prepare wallets.
This is what you dreamed for decades. Simulator of Kissing.
Cute sweetheart emo-like girl you can kiss. VR support. (optional)
Everything is done at the highest level. Graceful synchronous animations, high-quality graphics, cuteness.
The game will give you a girlfriend


Control:
Mouse or VR-helmet, the button E or the trigger on the controller to kiss.

Technical Information:

First Person View
Character has a Body
Good graphics
Quality animations
You can control camera
Light 180 degree VR support
Achievements
